section.title: Comparing and replacing files based on the Git history
Comparing files
section.para:
Eclipse Git allows you to compare a selected file, folder or project with another commit or with the Git index. Use
Team Compare with
to open the menu. Afterwards select with what you want to compare. The HEAD Revision selection is depicted in the following screenshot.

section.title: Replacing files
section.para:
The
Team Replace with
menu entry allows you to replace the current selection with the version contained in the selected commit or the Git index.
